name: Jewels Match Crush Pop：A classic jewel match 3 time killer casual game
name_original: Jewels Match Crush Pop：A classic jewel match 3 time killer casual game
description:
Classic casual match-3 jewel casual game is now available!

Jewels Match Crush Pop is a simple,but very popular little game.

How to play:
1,Select the 3 or more same jewel to eliminate.
2: Match the jewels until the board transparency, the Jewels star will appear.
3: Make the jewels star down to last line to pass the level.

Tips:
Eliminate the more diamonds can get more extra scores.
And Combo can get extra scores.

FEATURES:
- Two Game Modes: Arcade, Classic
- Match four jewels can win the jewel's bomb.
- Match five jewels can win color-changing jewels and 2 lighting
- Easy-to-play and clean interface

If you like our game, please give us a 5 star! Thank you for your appreciate!
